page.title: 19Life as a VIformer.Hoo area.
page.content: I catch the bus to schoo at 8.35 arriving at 9 am.I study History,Geogr- aphy & Politics "A" levels.Lessons are from 9.20 to 12 and 1 to 3.45."Free" periods can be spent in the small library & the rooms adjacent to the Common Room.I,like many others,spend too much time in th Common Room where a coffee bar & tuck shop is run.The VI Form Society subsidises trips to plays, films & concerts,classical and rock,and provides a Student card. At dinner times I go to the "Crown & Anchor" to avoid the canteen and boredom whenever possible,but on Wednesday I am on Prefect Duty with a friend. Visits into Framlingham are allowed, as is smoking along New Street. I spend the evening listening to music or watching T.V. Ocasionally I go to see friends or to the pub with them.
